code:
import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';const initialState={sidebarOpen:true,darkMode:false,notifications:[]};const uiSlice=createSlice({name:'ui',initialState,reducers:{toggleSidebar:state=>{state.sidebarOpen=!state.sidebarOpen;},setSidebarOpen:(state,action)=>{state.sidebarOpen=action.payload;},toggleDarkMode:state=>{state.darkMode=!state.darkMode;},addNotification:(state,action)=>{const notification={...action.payload,id:Date.now().toString(),timestamp:Date.now()};state.notifications.unshift(notification);// Keep only the last 10 notifications
if(state.notifications.length>10){state.notifications=state.notifications.slice(0,10);}},removeNotification:(state,action)=>{state.notifications=state.notifications.filter(n=>n.id!==action.payload);},clearNotifications:state=>{state.notifications=[];}}});export const{toggleSidebar,setSidebarOpen,toggleDarkMode,addNotification,removeNotification,clearNotifications}=uiSlice.actions;export default uiSlice.reducer;
